results.title: Hyper-IgD syndrome with novel mutation in a Japanese girl.
results.text_hl: She was treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, which resulted in a moderate decrease of the urinary @CHEMICAL_Mevalonic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008798 @@@mevalonic acid@@@ concentration and good clinical course.

citations.NLM: Naruto T, Nakagishi Y, Mori M, Miyamae T, Imagawa T, Yokota S. Hyper-IgD syndrome with novel mutation in a Japanese girl. Mod Rheumatol. 2009;19(1):96-9. PMID: 18941711
